Foundations

The foundations are the global rules which govern the appearance, structure and behaviour of elements and components.

Typography

Guidelines on business.gov.au fonts and text styles.

Colours

Guidelines on business.gov.au colours.

Buttons and links

Global links styles for internal and external links.

Icons

Business.gov.au icon set.

Form elements

Styles form elements including error messages.

Illustrations

Guidelines on business.gov.au illustration style.

Grid system

Guidelines for vertical and horizontal spacing on business.gov.au

Animations

Hover states for interactive elements
